version.versionReleaseNotes:
With pleasure, Atlassian presents version 1.6.1 of the Atlassian IDE Plugin for IDEA. This is a maintenance release, containing just two enhancements to smooth the upgrade to version 2 of the plugin, coming soon.

  • The plugin's upgrade prompt now includes a link to the release notes. (The upgrade prompt is the popup window which invites you to install the latest version of the plugin.)
  • The upgrade now allows a different version-numbering pattern, to allow for 'alpha' and 'beta' releases.
